description: Samoa prop Tietie Tuimauga will join Saracens for their 2025-26 Premiership campaign.
title: Tietie Tuimauga: Saracens sign Samoa prop from French side Montauban
title_page: Tietie Tuimauga: Saracens sign Samoa prop from French side Montauban - BBC Sport
maintext:
Samoa prop Tietie Tuimauga will join Saracens for their 2025-26 Premiership campaign.
The 31-year-old tighthead has won eight caps for his country and joins after two seasons with French second tier side Montauban.
Tuimauga, who can also play loosehead, has spent the last three years in France having also head a spell at Brivem, as well as playing for Connacht and New Zealand side Wellington.
"He will being plenty of experience and know-how to our front row, and with his scrummaging ability we believe he will be a real asset for us moving forward," director of rugby Mark McCall said.
